xml.data:
Home » 40P14 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 1 Hetuduka » 1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayānuloma
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Hetuduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayānuloma
Hetu-ārammaṇa
2.
6Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
7Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
8Nahetu dhammo nanahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
9Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
3.
10Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava…pe…  upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca…pe…  avigate nava. (Pañhāvārampi evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
<< Hetuup2 Sahetukaduka >>
